title: CWC decides to vote against government
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) The Ceylon Workers’ Congress, after extensive discussions, has collectively taken a decision to vote against the present government, tweeted Former State Minister Jeevan Thondaman.
The decision has been communicated to the party leaders of the ruling party, the opposition and the independents, he added.
‘Won’t join Interim Govt if President & PM remain’ – Opposition Leader
Pope Francis & Cardinal attend holy mass to remember those who died in the 2019 Easter Attacks
